speaker: speaker1
text: how do you usually get to school ?

speaker: speaker2
text: I usually ride my bike . Which form of transport do you prefer to use ?

speaker: speaker1
text: I feel that I can see more when I pedal a bicycle , but when I feel lazy , I drive my car .

speaker: speaker2
text: I think we should discourage people from using their private cars . They produce too much pollution !

speaker: speaker1
text: I agree , but I would find it difficult to stop using my car . It's just so convenient .

speaker: speaker2
text: cars might be convenient , but they're so bad for the environment .

speaker: speaker2
text: no . I used to have one though . Once I started using my bicycle to get around , I found that I didn't really need it .

speaker: speaker1
text: maybe if I sold my car now , I wouldn't be so tempted to use it .

speaker: speaker2
text: you could try . It would save you a lot of money .

speaker: speaker1
text: that's true . Every month , I spend hundreds of dollars on gas , insurance , and repairs .

speaker: speaker2
text: if you got to class by riding a bicycle every day instead of driving , you will get lots of exercise , too !

speaker: speaker1
text: I could stand to lose a few pounds . Having a car has made me lazy . I never end up walking anywhere !

speaker: speaker2
text: let's go to a car dealership . I'll help you try to sell your car for a good price .
